description: This semantic model serves as library for other Catena-X models from Quality Management. It ensures that properties that are used over different models are defined in the same way.

CountryCodeTrait.description: Regular Expression that ensures a three-letter code

UuidV4Trait.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the UUID is composed of five groups of characters separated by hyphens, in the form 8-4-4-4-12 for a total of 36 characters (32 hexadecimal characters and 4 hyphens), optionally prefixed by "urn:uuid:" to make it an IRI.

RecordStatusEnumeration.description: Defining the enumeration for the record status

Text.description: Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.

ModelVersionTrait.description: Semantic model expression. Starting from 1.0.0 to 999.999.999.

UniqueID.description:
This Characteristic is linked to a property that is unique. 
Please see description of the linked property to get more details about uniqueness.

countryCode.description: Country code in  ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 codes where this session took place

catenaXQualityTaskId.description: A unique quality task identifier within the Catena-X data-space. The unique id uses the Catena-X UUID trait.

recordStatus.description:
The record operation enumeration can be used to realize delta update concept.
Delta update concept means:
- You transfer an initial load of data
- After the first week only the delta to the initial load is transferred


The record status describes whether this record is:
- new=>This record is transferred the first time
- update=> Some properties of this record have changed compared to a previous transfer
- delete=> This record was transferred in the initial load or in a previous delta update, but is not used any more and therefore it should be deleted on data consumer side
- same=> This record was transferred in the initial load or in a previous delta update

selectionCriteria.description: Describes the selection criteria a Catena-X data provider has applied to create this data set.

selectionEnd.description: Describes the end point for providing records in this data set.

selectionStart.description: Describes the starting point for providing records in this data set.

semanticModel.description: Semantic model without version information. So basically everything before the version information.

semanticModelVersion.description: The version of a semantic model in the format x.y.z. X is the major version number, y is the minor version number and z is the patch number.

sessionId.description: An OEM-specific session identifier that is unique in this company.

catenaXPartId.description: Catena-X ID of one part. A Catena-X ID is unique in Catena-X data-space

dataMatrixCode.description: String that is behind a data matrix code. Data matrix codes or short DMC are labelled/printed on components/parts. Example: A data matrix code can combine supplier name, part type, plant who manufactured this part, assembly line and production date. This resulting string is normally unique.

manufacturerPartNumber.description: Part number given from  the manufacturer or supplier of this part, component, sub component or raw material. A manufacturer part number is NOT unique: All parts of the same kind share the same part number.

manufacturerSerialNumber.description: Serial number given from the manufacturer or supplier of this part, component, sub component. A manufacturer serial number is unique: With the serial number the produced part can be traced within the manufacturer.

partName.description: Part name of one part. A part name is not unique.

partNumber.description: Part number of one part. A part number is NOT unique.

serialNumber.description: Serial number of a part. A serial number is unique that means no other part/component has the same serial number.

supplierId.description: Specific ID of the supplier that manufactured the part that was put out - available if known

MileageCounter.description: The mileage counter of the car.

anonymizedVIN.description: OEM-specific hashed VIN. Necessary to link current data set with other data sets.

catenaXVehicleId.description: A unique identifier for the vehicle in the Catena-X data space.

mileage.description: The mileage counter in the car. Only positive numbers are allowed.

generalProperties.description: Bundling general properties that do not belong to parts or vehicles.

partProperties.description: Bundling part/component properties. A part/component is meant as one piece in a vehicle. The terms part and component are synonymes.

vehicleProperties.description: Bundling vehicle/car properties like anonymizedVIN or mileage counter.
